00034   CaliceHit() {};

00047   CaliceHit(unsigned moduleID, unsigned chip, unsigned channel, float valueEnergy,
00048             float errorEnergy, int timeStamp, unsigned type) {
00049     
00050     obj()->setIntVal(4, timeStamp);
00051     obj()->setIntVal(0, moduleID);
00052     obj()->setIntVal(1, chip);
00053     obj()->setIntVal(2, channel);
00054     obj()->setIntVal(3, type);
00055   
00056     obj()->setFloatVal(1, errorEnergy);
00057     obj()->setFloatVal(0, valueEnergy);
00058   };

00061

00063   
00066   inline unsigned getModuleID() const {
00067     return (unsigned) (getIntVal(0));
00068   }; 
00069   
00072   inline unsigned getChip() const {
00073     return (unsigned) (getIntVal(1));
00074   };
00075   
00078   inline unsigned getChannel() const {
00079     return (unsigned) (getIntVal(2));
00080   };
00081   
00084   inline unsigned getCellKey() const {
00085     return (unsigned) ((getChip() << 8) + getChannel());
00086   }  
00087   
00090   inline float getEnergyValue() const {
00091     return getFloatVal(0);
00092   };
00093   
00096   inline float getEnergyError() const {
00097     return getFloatVal(1);
00098   };
00099   
00102   inline int getTimeStamp() const {
00103     return getIntVal(4);
00104   };      
00105   
00108   inline unsigned getType() const {
00109     return (unsigned) (getIntVal(3));
00110   };  
00111 
00114   inline void setEnergyValue(float energyValue) {
00115     obj()->setFloatVal(0, energyValue);
00116   };
00117   
00120   inline void setEnergyError(float energyError) {
00121     obj()->setFloatVal(1, energyError);
00122   };
00123   
00126   inline void setTimeStamp(unsigned timeStamp) {
00127     obj()->setIntVal(4, timeStamp);
00128   };      
00129

00134   };
